Title
“A FLEXIBLE DISTRIBUTED STORAGE INTEGRITY AUDITING MECHANISM IN
CLOUD COMPUTING.”
Description
The  was carried out to enforce the quality of dependable cloud storage service for
users, we proposed an effective and flexible distributed scheme with explicit dynamic data
support, including block update, delete and append. We relied on erasure correcting code in the
file  distribution  preparation  to  provide  redundancy  parity  vectors  and  guarantee  the  data
dependability. The  was successfully implemented and tested the data migration to cloud
environment.
